resources.string: We are in need of volunteers to work at our pet food shelf and vaccination clinics. We can also use help in office support-type roles, help with their website and deliver pet food for them. Contact us if you are interested!

We are available from 9:00 am â€“ 5:00 pm and occasional evenings and weekends. The only requirement is that you are at least 12 years old.All work takes place at their warehouse located at 8501 54th Ave N. in New Hope.

As a volunteer you can provide direct service, doing things such as transporting seniors to medical appointment, cleaing, , raking, building ramps or helping with moves. You are welcome to help with anything!

The Bridge for Youth is currently looking for committed individuals to join them in their Youth Response Center (YRC). Their awesome volunteers take calls and texts 24/7/365 from youth looking for a place to stay or just looking for someone with whom they can talk.
